verbose_text: Expression of DarT led to the inhibition of DNA replication (XREF_FIG D for EPEC), which occurred within 5 min in E. coli BL21 (D3) (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY C) and could be caused by DNA ADP ribosylation stalling DNA synthesis.
evidence: DNA replication ( XREF_FIG D for EPEC), which occurred within 5 min in E. coli BL21(D3) ( XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY C) and could be caused by DNA ADP
